title: Macbook Air A1466 Stuck at 480mAmp-820-00165-A
message:
Hi

i got a macbook air 820-00165-Awhich is stucked at 480mAmp. Board looks fine. i didn't find liquid or corrosion damage on board. Even i didn't find any burnt component or loose soldering through visual inspection.
Then check some voltages and found everything normal.
From PPBUS_G3H to CPU VCORE. All 5V, 3V rails and S5 and S0 rails also.  All these are present and normal.
SMC_Wake_L---3V
SMC_RESET_L--3.4V
SMC_CLK32K--1.7V
PM_SLP_S4_L---3.3V
SMC_ONOFF_L--3.4V


Could you please guide me what i am leaving behind?

title: Macbook Air A1466 Stuck at 480mAmp-820-00165-A
message:
PLT_RESET_L goes high?
Did you check for USB activity, on both ports?

title: Macbook Air A1466 Stuck at 480mAmp-820-00165-A
message:
Hi, Before it was stucked at 450mAmp but now nothing happening at all. its nit pulling any current and i noted this values.
I have no idea how to diagnose/trace PM_SLP_S4_L.

P5VS4RS3_EN -0V
PM_SLP_S4_L---0V

title: Macbook Air A1466 Stuck at 480mAmp-820-00165-A
message:
Post U1950 voltages.
Also check VCCST_PWRGD.

title: Macbook Air A1466 Stuck at 480mAmp-820-00165-A
message:
So board doesn't get now other voltage after 3V3_S5?
3V3_SUS is there at least?

message:

title: Macbook Air A1466 Stuck at 480mAmp-820-00165-A
message:
Trigger SMC_ONOFF_L and check for drop pulse at PM_PWRBTN_L.
If present, check for pulse at PM_SLP_Sx_L at same time.
Be sure PM_RSMRST_L is steady high and all PCH's RTC signals present.
